Package io.xlorey.fluxloader.plugin

Class PluginRegistry

java.lang.Object
io.xlorey.fluxloader.plugin.PluginRegistry
public class PluginRegistry extends Object
Author: Deknil GitHub: https://github.com/Deknil Date: 10.02.2024 Description: Centralized storage of information about plugins, their instances, etc.

FluxLoader В© 2024. All rights reserved.

  • Constructor Details

    • PluginRegistry

      public PluginRegistry()

  • Method Details

    • getClassByName

      public static Class<?> getClassByName(String name)
      Retrieves the Class object for a given class name from the cache or loaders. If the class is not found in the cache, searches through all loaders to find the class.
      Parameters:
      name - The fully qualified name of the desired class.
      Returns:
      The Class object corresponding to the specified name, or null if the class could not be found.

    • addClassInCache

      public static void addClassInCache(String name, Class<?> clazz)
      Adds a Class object to the cache if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      name - The fully qualified name of the class.
      clazz - The Class object to be added to the cache.

    • addPluginLoader

      public static void addPluginLoader(String id, PluginClassLoader loader)
      Adding a plugin class loader to the repository
      Parameters:
      id - plugin identifier
      loader - plugin class loader

    • getPluginControlsRegistry

      public static HashMap<String,IControlsWidget> getPluginControlsRegistry()
      Retrieves the list of loaded client plugins controls
      Returns:
      HashMap containing information about loaded client plugin icons, where the key is the plugin ID. and the value is the corresponding ControlsWidget instance.

    • getPluginIconRegistry

      public static HashMap<String,zombie.core.textures.Texture> getPluginIconRegistry()
      Retrieves the list of loaded client plugins icons
      Returns:
      HashMap containing information about loaded client plugin icons, where the key is the plugin ID. and the value is the corresponding texture instance.

    • getLoadedClientPlugins

      public static HashMap<String,Plugin> getLoadedClientPlugins()
      Retrieves the list of loaded client plugins
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing information about loaded client plugins, where the key is "entryPoint:ID:Version" and the value is the corresponding Plugin instance.

    • getLoadedServerPlugins

      public static HashMap<String,Plugin> getLoadedServerPlugins()
      Retrieves the list of loaded server plugins
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing information about loaded server plugins, where the key is "entryPoint:ID:Version" and the value is the corresponding Plugin instance.

    • addPluginIcon

      public static void addPluginIcon(String pluginId, zombie.core.textures.Texture texture)
      Adds a plugin icon to the registry.
      Parameters:
      pluginId - Plugin ID
      texture - Texture of the plugin icon

    • addPluginControls

      public static void addPluginControls(String pluginId, IControlsWidget controlsWidget)
      Adds plugin controls to the registry.
      Parameters:
      pluginId - Plugin ID
      controlsWidget - An instance of the plugin controls

    • addClientPlugin

      public static void addClientPlugin(String pluginId, Plugin plugin)
      Adds a client plugin instance to the registry.
      Parameters:
      pluginId - Plugin ID, including entry point, ID and version (ENTRYPOINT:ID:VERSION)
      plugin - Plugin instance

    • addServerPlugin

      public static void addServerPlugin(String pluginId, Plugin plugin)
      Adds an instance of the server plugin to the registry.
      Parameters:
      pluginId - Plugin ID, including entry point, ID and version (ENTRYPOINT:ID:VERSION)
      plugin - Plugin instance

    • getPluginIcon

      public static zombie.core.textures.Texture getPluginIcon(String pluginId)
      Returns the plugin icon by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      pluginId - Plugin ID
      Returns:
      The texture of the plugin icon, if found; otherwise null.

    • getPluginControls

      public static IControlsWidget getPluginControls(String pluginId)
      Returns plugin controls by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      pluginId - Plugin ID
      Returns:
      An instance of the plugin controls, if found; otherwise null.
